Package org.aoplib4j.gof.observer

Package containing the classes for implementing the Observer Pattern.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
NotifyInformation Interface containing the notification informations.
 

Class Summary
ObserverCallback Abstract class that must be implemented to code the behavior of an Aoplib4jObserver when is notified by a Aoplib4jSubject.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Aoplib4jObserver Annotation to be used on classes to mark them as a GOF Observer.
Aoplib4jRegisterObserver Annotation to be put on methods having a single parameter.
Aoplib4jSubject Annotation to be used on classes to mark them as a GOF Aoplib4jSubject.
Aoplib4jUnregisterObservers Annotation to be put on methods to remove all the observers attached to the current class.
NotifyObservers Annotation to mark the methods of classes annotated with the Aoplib4jSubject annotation to notify a change to the class to all the attached observers.
 

Package org.aoplib4j.gof.observer Description

Package containing the classes for implementing the Observer Pattern.
